fields.nature_of_complaint: Laptop is running very slow and frequently freezes when using accounting software.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Performed disk cleanup, defragmented the hard drive, and upgraded RAM from 8GB to 16GB. System performance is now optimal.

fields.nature_of_complaint: The monitor keeps flickering and sometimes goes completely black for a few seconds.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Checked and re-seated the display cable. Updated the graphics driver. The issue persists, suspecting a faulty monitor backlight.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Printer is not connecting to the network. Getting a 'Printer Offline' error on all computers.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Troubleshooting network connectivity. Suspected faulty network card on the printer. Awaiting replacement part.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Computer won't turn on. There are no lights and no fan noise when the power button is pressed.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Tested the Power Supply Unit (PSU) with a multimeter and found it to be faulty. Replaced the PSU with a compatible 250W unit. The computer now powers on and boots into Windows successfully.

fields.nature_of_complaint: The scanner is not reading barcodes correctly. It either fails to scan or scans the wrong number.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Cleaned the scanner lens and reset the device to factory settings. Recalibrated for the ISBN and EAN barcode types used by the library system.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Constant paper jams on every print job, especially when printing duplex.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Disassembled the paper feed assembly. Found and removed a small piece of a torn label. Reassembled and testing now.

fields.nature_of_complaint: UPS is beeping continuously with the 'replace battery' light on. It is not providing backup power during outages.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Tested the battery; found it to be completely dead. Replaced with a new RBC7 battery pack. UPS is now calibrated and functioning correctly.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Projector lamp is very dim and the image has a yellow tint. The 'LAMP' indicator is flashing orange.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Confirmed lamp life has been exceeded. Ordered a new ELPLP96 replacement lamp. The part is expected to arrive in 3-5 business days. Record will be updated upon installation.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Computer frequently crashes with a Blue Screen of Death (BSOD), showing error code 'MEMORY_MANAGEMENT'.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Ran Windows Memory Diagnostic, which found errors. Replaced both RAM sticks. However, the user reported the issue happened again. Further diagnostics point to a faulty motherboard memory slot.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Keyboard is not responding correctly. The 'E', 'R', and 'spacebar' keys are intermittently getting stuck or not registering.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Attempted to clean under the keys using compressed air. The issue persists. This model has the faulty butterfly keyboard. Escalating for a top case replacement under the quality program.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Camera feed for 'Car Park B' is not showing on the main monitor. It just shows a black screen.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Traced the BNC cable from the DVR to the monitor. Found a loose connection at the DVR end. Re-crimped the connector and secured it. All feeds are now displaying correctly.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Laptop is unable to connect to the office WiFi 'Uni-Staff-WIFI'. It sees the network but fails to obtain an IP address. It connects to other networks fine.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Removed the existing WiFi profile for 'Uni-Staff-WIFI'. Re-installed the Intel WiFi drivers from the manufacturer's website. Reconnected to the network and successfully obtained an IP address. Awaiting user confirmation.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Webcam video is black during Microsoft Teams calls, although the indicator light on the webcam turns on.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Checked privacy settings in Windows 10. Found that access to the camera was disabled for desktop apps. Enabled access and verified the camera is now working in Teams.

fields.nature_of_complaint: The device is overheating and the fan is constantly running at high speed, even with no applications open.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Checked Task Manager for rogue processes, none found. Running hardware diagnostics and checking for dust buildup in the vents. System update is pending, will apply and monitor.

fields.nature_of_complaint: Scanner produces images with a solid black line running down the entire length of the page.
fields.maintenance_action_taken: Inspected the scanner glass and document feeder. Found a small speck of dried correction fluid on the scanning element. Cleaned the glass and element with an isopropyl alcohol wipe. Test scans are now clean and free of the black line.
